txt_en: There's nothing for you behind you. All that exists is what's ahead.
txt_cn: 来路无可眷恋，值得期待的只有前方。

txt_en: Distance doesn't mean separation.
txt_cn: 距离不代表分离。

txt_en: Let's cross the bridge when we come to it.
txt_cn: 船到桥头自然直。

txt_en: The beauty of summer can heal the winter of your life.
txt_cn: 夏天里的美好，能治愈生命里的冬天。

txt_en: Nothing in this world that's worth having comes easy.
txt_cn: 这世界上凡是值得拥有的东西，都不易获得。

txt_en: That man is the richest whose pleasure are the cheapest.
txt_cn: 能处处寻求快乐的人才是最富有的人。

txt_en: Practice random kindness and senseless acts of beauty.
txt_cn: 随心随意求美，无来无由行善。

txt_en: They who cannot do as they would, must do as they can.
txt_cn: 不能如愿而行，也须尽力而为。

txt_en: Why waste precious time dreaming when waking life is so much better?
txt_cn: 醒着的生活是如此美好，为何要把时间浪费在做梦上呢?

txt_en: Up the bright moon rises from the sea; I share the same moment though far from thee.
txt_cn: 海上生明月，天涯共此时。

txt_en: Everyone you meet is fighting a battle you know nothing about.
txt_cn: 每个人都在经历你无法想象的困境。

txt_en: It isn't what we say or think that defines us, but what we do.
txt_cn: 定义我们的并非所说所想，而是所做。

txt_en: Distance doesn't ruin a relationship. Doubts do.
txt_cn: 毁灭感情的不是距离，而是怀疑。

txt_en: The better you become, the better you attract.
txt_cn: 你若盛开，蝴蝶自来。

txt_en: A smile is the most charming part of a person forever.
txt_cn: 微笑永远是一个人最迷人的特质。

txt_en: I am a slow walker, but I never walk backwards.
txt_cn: 我走得很慢，但是我从来不会后退。

txt_en: We're all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
txt_cn: 身在井隅，心向璀璨。

txt_en: The family is more important than the dream.
txt_cn: 家人是比梦想更重要的事情。

txt_en: Don't moon away the Mid-Autumn Festival.
txt_cn: 找点事儿做吧，不要虚度了中秋佳节。

txt_en: Up the bright moon rises from the sea; I share the same moment though far from thee.
txt_cn: 海上生明月，天涯共此时。

txt_en: No man needs a vacation much as the man who has just had one.
txt_cn: 没有人比刚刚过完假期的人更需要假期了。

txt_en: Every leaf speaks bliss to me, fluttering from the autumn tree.
txt_cn: 每一片飘落的秋叶，都在向我诉说着狂喜。

txt_en: I have tried my best to live an ordinary life.
txt_cn: 我拼尽全力，不过是为了过完平凡的一生。

txt_en: It's easy to straighten a tree when it's small, but it's difficult to stretch a tree when it's big.
txt_cn: 树小扶直易，树大扳伸难。

txt_en: Have you booked your ticket?
txt_cn: 你定上火车票了吗？
